comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Caption says Cravath but photo has "Brennen" written on it. (?) Here is article about Cravath: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gavvy_Cravath

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
Harry Angstrom:

Thanks for linking to the additional information. The re-identification of this player as Cravath rather than Brennen is based on research by the Pictorial History Committee of the Society for American Baseball Research.
